description: Yeehaa excels in transformative design with extensive experience in both academics and industry. Background in cognitive science and high-impact roles, bringing creativity and analytical skills. Accomplished in innovation, project leadership, and user-centered design, Yeehaa is driven by a passion for impactful solutions. Authored 'Across Space And Time' on dynamic ecosystems. Curated 'Cultivate Your Ecosystem' course for personal and professional growth.
blurb: Ecosystems once limited by geography now describe dynamic, dispersed human organizations. This shift, fueled by the internet, calls for 'ecosystem architecture,' a multidisciplinary design approach.
